award_name.ja: ターボ機械協会論文賞

paper_title.ja: 渦法によるサイクロイダルプロペラ特性の数値解析
paper_title.en: Numerical Analysis of the Characteristics of Cycloidal Propeller with the Vortex Method

description.ja: The characteristics of cycloidal propellers, which is aimed to be installed on airships, were analyzed numerically with two and three dimensional vortex methods. Three dimensional calculated results of the thrust and flows around the propeller explained the experimental results and also suggested the importance of the wing tip vortices on the flows. Calculations for propellers with the elliptic wings and rectangular wings of large aspect ratio were carried out to find an efficient wing shape. It was clarified that thrust values obviously increased in case of the large aspect ratio wings.
description.en: The characteristics of cycloidal propellers, which is aimed to be installed on airships, were analyzed numerically with two and three dimensional vortex methods. Three dimensional calculated results of the thrust and flows around the propeller explained the experimental results and also suggested the importance of the wing tip vortices on the flows. Calculations for propellers with the elliptic wings and rectangular wings of large aspect ratio were carried out to find an efficient wing shape. It was clarified that thrust values obviously increased in case of the large aspect ratio wings.

paper_title.ja: 非定常翼理論によるサイクロイダルプロペラの特性解析
paper_title.en: Analysis of the Characteristics of Cycloidal Propeller with the Unsteady Airfoil Theory

description.ja: The movement of the wing of the cycloidal propeller can be described as combination of in-phase pitching and heaving oscillation. Under consideration of this, characteristics of the propeller are analyzed with unsteady airfoil theory by Karman and Sears. Reduced frequency of the wing in this case is decided by the ratio of half chord length to rotational radius and is unrelated to rotational speed. It can be clarified that reduced thrust depends on the amplitude of the oscillation and the moving velocity of the propeller. Results of quasi-steady and unsteady analyses are shown in the vector diagrams, and unsteady flow effect by wake vortices generation is inferred by comparing both results. Calculated results of the power for generating thrust and the thrust efficiency are also discussed.
description.en: The movement of the wing of the cycloidal propeller can be described as combination of in-phase pitching and heaving oscillation. Under consideration of this, characteristics of the propeller are analyzed with unsteady airfoil theory by Karman and Sears. Reduced frequency of the wing in this case is decided by the ratio of half chord length to rotational radius and is unrelated to rotational speed. It can be clarified that reduced thrust depends on the amplitude of the oscillation and the moving velocity of the propeller. Results of quasi-steady and unsteady analyses are shown in the vector diagrams, and unsteady flow effect by wake vortices generation is inferred by comparing both results. Calculated results of the power for generating thrust and the thrust efficiency are also discussed.

paper_title.ja: 510 渦法によるサイクロイダルプロペラ特性の数値解析(一般セッション)
paper_title.en: 510 Numerical Analysis of Cycloidal Propeller with Vortex Method

description.ja: The cycloidal propeller is a propulsion system which can derive thrust in omni-direction by changing the attack angle of wing rotating with a constant speed. In order to investigate the characteristics of the cycloidal propeller, it is analyzed with Vortex method in this study. The motion of the propeller can be described as combination of in-phase pitching and heaving oscillation. Results of quasi-steady and unsteady analyses are shown in the vector diagrams. Unsteady flow effect by wake vortices is inferred by comparing both results. Calculated results of the average of wind velocity and direction confirm the necessity of the unsteady flow analysis, and it can be explained by the distribution of vortices.
description.en: The cycloidal propeller is a propulsion system which can derive thrust in omni-direction by changing the attack angle of wing rotating with a constant speed. In order to investigate the characteristics of the cycloidal propeller, it is analyzed with Vortex method in this study. The motion of the propeller can be described as combination of in-phase pitching and heaving oscillation. Results of quasi-steady and unsteady analyses are shown in the vector diagrams. Unsteady flow effect by wake vortices is inferred by comparing both results. Calculated results of the average of wind velocity and direction confirm the necessity of the unsteady flow analysis, and it can be explained by the distribution of vortices.

paper_title.ja: 509 平行壁面間で振動する翼による推進に関する研究(一般セッション)
paper_title.en: 509 Study On Propulsion by Oscillating Foil between Parallel Walls

description.ja: When a foil moves between parallel walls, unsteady lift and moment are larger than those of a foil without them; this is well known as wall effect. And aquatic animals, like tuna and dolphin and so on, swim very high speed and efficiency with the moving form; called pollution by oscillating foil. On this study, the effect of that wall effect influence on a moving foil between parallel walls is studied by numerical simulation. In consequence, they are made clear that the walls influence good effect for that foil, thrust power and thrust efficiency are increased, and the demerits that is transverse vibration of the foil is decreased.
description.en: When a foil moves between parallel walls, unsteady lift and moment are larger than those of a foil without them; this is well known as wall effect. And aquatic animals, like tuna and dolphin and so on, swim very high speed and efficiency with the moving form; called pollution by oscillating foil. On this study, the effect of that wall effect influence on a moving foil between parallel walls is studied by numerical simulation. In consequence, they are made clear that the walls influence good effect for that foil, thrust power and thrust efficiency are increased, and the demerits that is transverse vibration of the foil is decreased.

paper_title.ja: 912 非定常翼理論によるサイクロイダルブロペラ特性の解析
paper_title.en: 912 The Analysis on the Characteristics of Cycloidal Propellers with Unsteady Airfoil Theory

description.ja: This study analyzed the characteristic of cycloidal propellers with 'Karman & Sears theory' and 'the vortex method', modeling the movement of the propeller as rotation with pitching and heaving movements. The reduced frequency which decides the characteristics of unsteadiness depends on the ratio of the length of the blade to the ration radius. In unsteady flow, thrust increased and its direction changed as the reduced frequency increased. Thrust efficiency calculated by the unsteady theory showed lower value than that obtained from the quasi-steady theory. Thrust efficiency in unsteady flow decreased sharply as the attack angle increased.
description.en: This study analyzed the characteristic of cycloidal propellers with 'Karman & Sears theory' and 'the vortex method', modeling the movement of the propeller as rotation with pitching and heaving movements. The reduced frequency which decides the characteristics of unsteadiness depends on the ratio of the length of the blade to the ration radius. In unsteady flow, thrust increased and its direction changed as the reduced frequency increased. Thrust efficiency calculated by the unsteady theory showed lower value than that obtained from the quasi-steady theory. Thrust efficiency in unsteady flow decreased sharply as the attack angle increased.

paper_title.ja: 4033 地形モデル周りの流れ場の計測(G05-7 物体まわりの流れ(2),G05 流体工学)
paper_title.en: 4033 Measurement of Flow around a topography model

description.ja: Investigation of turbulent flow field on a complex terrain is important to estimate accurately the performance of wind turbine on the location. In order to obtain information of flow fields around an object, turbulent flow over different models, which are cone shape, bell shape and terrain model, has been examined by a wind tunnel. As the result, the periodic fluctuation was observed in the wake
description.en: Investigation of turbulent flow field on a complex terrain is important to estimate accurately the performance of wind turbine on the location. In order to obtain information of flow fields around an object, turbulent flow over different models, which are cone shape, bell shape and terrain model, has been examined by a wind tunnel. As the result, the periodic fluctuation was observed in the wake

paper_title.ja: 608 ボリュートケーシング内で振動する遠心羽根車に働く非定常力の解析
paper_title.en: 608 The analysis of unsteady forces of a centrifugal impeller whirling in a volute casing

description.ja: Lateral fluid forces working on a rotating centrifugal impeller in whirling motion were analyzed by using unsteady potential flow theory. Impellers operating in diffusers with vanes were modeled and the fluid forces were calculated. Results of fluid forces were converted to mass, damping, stiffness matrices by the Fourier Integral and least square method. The results for impellers with a volute casing showed that the time averaged values of fluid forces remained almost unchanged, while there were significant instantaneous fluctuations due to the impeller/volute casing interactions. And it was found that the elements of matrices for impeller with a volute casing were usually greater than those for impeller without the volute casing.
description.en: Lateral fluid forces working on a rotating centrifugal impeller in whirling motion were analyzed by using unsteady potential flow theory. Impellers operating in diffusers with vanes were modeled and the fluid forces were calculated. Results of fluid forces were converted to mass, damping, stiffness matrices by the Fourier Integral and least square method. The results for impellers with a volute casing showed that the time averaged values of fluid forces remained almost unchanged, while there were significant instantaneous fluctuations due to the impeller/volute casing interactions. And it was found that the elements of matrices for impeller with a volute casing were usually greater than those for impeller without the volute casing.

paper_title.ja: 811 ガイドベーン中の振動遠心羽根車に働く非定常力の解析(関東支部 茨城講演会)
paper_title.en: 811 Vibration of Unsteady Force of the Centrifugal Impeller Whirling in the Guidevanes

description.ja: Lateral fluid forces acting on a rotating centrifugal impeller in whirling motion were analyzed by using unsteady potential flow theory. Impellers operating in diffusers with vanes were modeled and the fluid forces were calculated. Results of fluid forces were converted to mass, damping, stiffness matrices by the Fourier Integral and least square method. The results for impellers with guide vanes showed that the time averaged values of fluid forces remained almost unchanged, while there were significant instantaneous fluctuations due to the impeller/guide vane interactions. And it was found that the elements of matrices for impeller with guide vanes were usually greater than those for impeller without guide vanes.
description.en: Lateral fluid forces acting on a rotating centrifugal impeller in whirling motion were analyzed by using unsteady potential flow theory. Impellers operating in diffusers with vanes were modeled and the fluid forces were calculated. Results of fluid forces were converted to mass, damping, stiffness matrices by the Fourier Integral and least square method. The results for impellers with guide vanes showed that the time averaged values of fluid forces remained almost unchanged, while there were significant instantaneous fluctuations due to the impeller/guide vane interactions. And it was found that the elements of matrices for impeller with guide vanes were usually greater than those for impeller without guide vanes.

paper_title.ja: 同流量の吸込みを伴う円形噴流の拡散に関する研究
paper_title.en: 同流量の吸込みを伴う円形噴流の拡散に関する研究

description.ja: Turbulent diffusion rates from the opening between the jet mouth and the suction were obtained from the circulating flow rate Q<SUB>0</SUB>, the density of tracer gas C<SUB>0</SUB> and the tracer gas supply Q<SUB>g</SUB> which were measured by the closed loop experimental apparatus. Nozzle jet with uniform discharge velocity and pipe jet with non-uniform velocity distribution were examined for the same area suction and the half area suction. In all cases suction gave very small effects to the axial velocity of the jet except very close region of the suction mouth. It was found out the influences of the suction could be well evaluated by introducing the increase diffusion rate. The effects of the gap of the center of the suction pipe were also discussed.
description.en: Turbulent diffusion rates from the opening between the jet mouth and the suction were obtained from the circulating flow rate Q<SUB>0</SUB>, the density of tracer gas C<SUB>0</SUB> and the tracer gas supply Q<SUB>g</SUB> which were measured by the closed loop experimental apparatus. Nozzle jet with uniform discharge velocity and pipe jet with non-uniform velocity distribution were examined for the same area suction and the half area suction. In all cases suction gave very small effects to the axial velocity of the jet except very close region of the suction mouth. It was found out the influences of the suction could be well evaluated by introducing the increase diffusion rate. The effects of the gap of the center of the suction pipe were also discussed.

paper_title.ja: 同流量の吸込みを伴う円形噴流の拡散に関する研究
paper_title.en: Diffusion from a Circular Jet with an Equal Flow Rate Suction

description.ja: Turbulent diffusion rates from the opening between the jet mouth and the downstream suction were obtained from the circulating flow rate Q_0, the density of tracer gas C_0 and the tracer gas supply Q_g which were measured by the closed loop experimental apparatus. Nozzle jet with uniform discharge velocity and pipe jet with non-uniform velocity distribution were examined for the same area suction and the half area suction. In all cases suction gave very small effects to the axial velocity of the jet except very close region of the suction mouth. In case with the jet mouth and suction mouth having same axis, turbulent diffusion rate hardly changed with the differences in the diameter of the suction mouth.
description.en: Turbulent diffusion rates from the opening between the jet mouth and the downstream suction were obtained from the circulating flow rate Q_0, the density of tracer gas C_0 and the tracer gas supply Q_g which were measured by the closed loop experimental apparatus. Nozzle jet with uniform discharge velocity and pipe jet with non-uniform velocity distribution were examined for the same area suction and the half area suction. In all cases suction gave very small effects to the axial velocity of the jet except very close region of the suction mouth. In case with the jet mouth and suction mouth having same axis, turbulent diffusion rate hardly changed with the differences in the diameter of the suction mouth.

paper_title.ja: 線形非定常翼理論の適用限界に関する一考察
paper_title.en: A Study of Applicable Limit of the Liner Unsteady Airfoil Theory

description.ja: In the case of applying the results of the analytical unsteady airfoil theory by Karman and Sears for practical cases, it is important to know the applicable limits because they were developed for the flat plate without steady loading. In this analysis, the applicable limits were investigated for the cases of the small amplitude vibration with steady loading and the cases of large amplitude without steady loading. Propulsions by the vibrating airfoil were also discussed.
description.en: In the case of applying the results of the analytical unsteady airfoil theory by Karman and Sears for practical cases, it is important to know the applicable limits because they were developed for the flat plate without steady loading. In this analysis, the applicable limits were investigated for the cases of the small amplitude vibration with steady loading and the cases of large amplitude without steady loading. Propulsions by the vibrating airfoil were also discussed.

paper_title.ja: 不均一流入条件における多孔板による空気吸込渦発生防止に関する研究
paper_title.en: 不均一流入条件における多孔板による空気吸込渦発生防止に関する研究

description.ja: To constrain the air-entraining vortices appeared in a pump reservoir, changingflow pattern by inserting a board is often very effective, but excessive change sometimes ends with a reverse effect especially in the case of non-uniform inlet conditions. Previous report<SUP>(2)</SUP> showed that the perforated board with an appropriate resistance, inserted into the water upstream of the suction pipe changes the flow pattern moderately and constrains the generation of the vortices effectively without reverse effects. In this paper, experiments were executed for the flow channels with upstream sudden expansion and right angled turn. Perforated board could constrain the vortices effectively for all cases.
description.en: To constrain the air-entraining vortices appeared in a pump reservoir, changingflow pattern by inserting a board is often very effective, but excessive change sometimes ends with a reverse effect especially in the case of non-uniform inlet conditions. Previous report<SUP>(2)</SUP> showed that the perforated board with an appropriate resistance, inserted into the water upstream of the suction pipe changes the flow pattern moderately and constrains the generation of the vortices effectively without reverse effects. In this paper, experiments were executed for the flow channels with upstream sudden expansion and right angled turn. Perforated board could constrain the vortices effectively for all cases.

paper_title.en: 振動遠心羽根車の付加質量の方向性に関する研究

paper_title.ja: 多孔板による空気吸込渦発生防止に関する研究
paper_title.en: 多孔板による空気吸込渦発生防止に関する研究

description.ja: The air-entraining vortices appeared in a pump sump often exert a bad influence to the pump characteristics, and moreover generate loud noise and severe vibration of the pump shaft and pipe systems. To constrain the vortices, changing the flow pattern in the sump by inserting a board is often very effective, but excessive change sometimes ends with a reverse effect especially in the case of the nonuniform inlet flow conditions. In this paper, it is shown that the perforated board with an appropriate resistance, inserted into the water upstream of the suction pipe, changes the flow pattern moderately and constrains the generation of the vortex effectively, for both uniform and nonuniform inlet flow conditions.
description.en: The air-entraining vortices appeared in a pump sump often exert a bad influence to the pump characteristics, and moreover generate loud noise and severe vibration of the pump shaft and pipe systems. To constrain the vortices, changing the flow pattern in the sump by inserting a board is often very effective, but excessive change sometimes ends with a reverse effect especially in the case of the nonuniform inlet flow conditions. In this paper, it is shown that the perforated board with an appropriate resistance, inserted into the water upstream of the suction pipe, changes the flow pattern moderately and constrains the generation of the vortex effectively, for both uniform and nonuniform inlet flow conditions.
